useCase.name: Check Status and Filter Agenda Entries
useCase.description: Collaborator checks assigned tasks, filters agenda entries by date or status, and displays updated entries.

mainSequence.step: Collaborator asks to check assigned tasks.
AgendaController gets assigned entries from Agenda.
Collaborator asks to filter by date or status.
GUI filters agenda entries by date and status.
AgendaController filters agenda entries by date and status.
